title: Wapfika
author: Wapfika
content: I’m looking for an Amazon Prime Video account. Either a subscription or share account is enough for me because I will just watch a specific series then I don’t need anymore the account. I’m paying only a reasonable amount because I will not use the account in long term. Comment or shoot me a PM for offer.Payment in Bitcoin. I will not sent first on this transaction. Remember this when providing to me an offer. The only time I will send first is if you are a reputable user here.

comments.author: MadHatters
comments.body: I can help with youSend me message

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: @Wapfika, be careful with your purchases and avoid US based Prime Video if you are not from the US - the reason is that you will get very limited content because you will be treated as a US user who is outside the US.

comments.author: Rami84
comments.body: If you still looking I can provide you with a 12months subscription to prime video for $14 and it's a private account but not US

comments.author: Eternad
comments.body: Quote from: Wapfika on June 02, 2023, 03:24:18 PMI’m looking for an Amazon Prime Video account. Either a subscription or share account is enough for me because I will just watch a specific series then I don’t need anymore the account. What specific series you are interested to watch because most of the series and movie are already available on some streaming website even the newest and ongoing series. You can use Fbox.to or Bilibili app to search for the series that you want. I’m using these website to watch all the series that I want like The Last of Us and so on.You can use IDM if you want to download it. It’s a waste of money if you will purchased a subscription for just a single series that you want while there’s a lot of uploader available online with HD quality too. You can DM if you need help for the setup and apps for the IDM. I have the crack version.

comments.author: Wapfika

I already have the copy and of the series that I’m planning to watch.
